text: The 2006 African Women's Handball Championship was the 17th edition of the African Women's Handball Championship, held in Tunisia from 12 to 20 January 2006. It acted as the African qualifying tournament for the 2007 World Women's Handball Championship. ==Preliminary round== All times are local (UTC+1). ===Group A=== \---- \---- ===Group B=== \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Knockout stage== ===Bracket=== ===Semifinals=== \---- ===Fifth place game=== ===Third place game=== ===Final=== ==Final ranking== {| class="infobox bordered" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 2007 World Championship |} {| class="wikitable" !Rank !Team |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:gold medal icon.svg|| |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:silver medal icon.svg|| |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:bronze medal icon.svg|| |- |align=center|4|| |- |align=center|5|| |- |align=center|6|| |- |align=center|7|| |} ==External links== *Results on todor66.com 2006 Women African Women's Handball Championship African Women's Handball Championship African Women's Handball Championship Category:2006 in African handball Category:January 2006 sports events in Africa Category:Women's handball in Tunisia
